about_the_game:
This Special Fan Pack, includes a digitally downloadable Newspaper from the original Alien invasion, wallpapers and Soundtracks, plus a how-to guide on making your very own tin foil hat.

This Special Fan Pack includes:

Original Extras
Greyhill Incident (Original Extras) - Bob's Tin Foil Hat Manual
Greyhill Incident (Original Extras) - Conspiracy Advertisement
Greyhill Incident (Original Extras) - Conspiracy Newspaper
Original Soundtracks:
Greyhill Incident (Original Soundtrack) - Main Menu Theme | by Eric Gordon Berg
Greyhill Incident (Original Soundtrack) - Main Theme | by Eric Gordon Berg
Greyhill Incident (Original Soundtrack) - This is Our World | by Ryan White Maloney
Greyhill Incident (Original Soundtrack) - This is Our World (Instrumental)
Original Wallpapers:
Greyhill Incident (Original Wallpaper) - Classics
Greyhill Incident (Original Wallpaper) - Cover


You may also check out the "Found Footage Mode" DLC or the "Digital Abducted Edition" Bundle to get both DLCs discounted together.


Here's how to find the files on your computer:
1. Find Greyhill Incident in your Steam Library
2. Open the game properties
3. Under "Local Files", click "Browse"
4. The DLC content will be in the folder named Fan_Pack

This Special Fan Pack, includes a digitally downloadable Newspaper from the original Alien invasion, wallpapers and Soundtracks, plus a how-to guide on making your very own tin foil hat.

This Special Fan Pack includes:

Original Extras

Original Wallpapers:
Greyhill Incident (Original Wallpaper) - Classics

You may also check out the "Found Footage Mode" DLC or the "Digital Abducted Edition" Bundle to get both DLCs discounted together.


Here's how to find the files on your computer:
1. Find Greyhill Incident in your Steam Library
2. Open the game properties

name: Greyhill Incident - Fan Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 / AMD A8-7600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This Special "Fan Pack", includes a Digitally downloadable Newspaper from the original Alien invasion, wallpapers and Soundtracks, plus a how-to guide on making your very own tin foil hat.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
